title: 112_s965
content: Family Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income-based tax credit for 50 of qualified infertility treatment expenses. Allows $13,360 of such expenses to be taken into account for purposes of such credit for all taxable years. Defines qualified infertility treatment expenses as amounts paid for the treatment of infertility via in vitro fertilization if such treatment is provided by a licensed physician, surgeon, or other medical practitioner and is administered with respect to a diagnosis of infertility by a physician licensed in the United States.
